title: New mum Alesha Dixon slays smart casual as she arrives for America's Got Talent
text:
Alesha returned to work several weeks after giving birth (Picture: SplashNews.com)

Alesha Dixon was in high spirits on her way to the America’s Got Talent: The Champions filming in Los Angeles and we’re excited to see her as a new judge.

The former Mis-Teeq singer rocked a half head of braids while working the smart-casual look better than anyone.

It was announced the 41-year-old was joining the judging panel for season two of the popular show – replacing Mel B – last month and it looks like they’re getting straight into it.

Alesha secretly gave birth to her second child back in August and we can’t get over how amazing she looks.

She wasted no time in getting back into the grind of working just weeks after having her baby and we’re seriously in awe.

At the time, she said she was ‘super excited’ to be joining the reality television show’s judging panel, which also features pal Simon Cowell, Heidi Klum and Howie Mandel.

With each day of filming, Alesha keeps returning with better and better looks.

Alesha has been serving us look after look (Picture: SplashNews.com)

The singer shared a photo of her adorable baby on Instagram (Picture: Alesha Dixon/Instagram)

She was photographed wearing a deep blue peacock patterned shirt-dress, a cute floral playsuit and a plunging top with high-waisted cargo trousers.

Reckon she’ll start posting exactly where she gets her outfits from if we ask nicely?

The star waited seven whole weeks before deciding to post about her new baby, Anaya Safiya, born on 20 August.

Alesha wrote under an adorable photo of the newborn on Instagram: ‘7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet.’

The singer managed to keep us all in the dark as her last Instagram post before the announcement showed her wearing a sheer sparkly dress with her baby bump clearly visible.

But she was spotted arriving for filming of AGT last Friday with her bump clearly missing, sparking rumours she had already given birth.

Anaya is Alesha’s second child with her husband Azuka; the couple is already parents to five-year-old daughter Azura Sienna.
